p:
The number of EV-B types is larger than that of EV-A, and the recombination between the genotypes is also very frequent
26â€“ 28 . Many articles have discussed the reorganization of different novel EV-B strains
20, 21, 29 . We know that recombination and nucleotide mutations promote the evolution of enteroviruses and new type emergence. Recombinant analysis is also crucial in epidemiological studies. We found that six Tibet EV-B83 strains and many previously discovered new enteroviruses (EV-B80, EV-B106, etc.) have reliable recombination in multiple genomic regions.
